generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, curbs, and a Mercedes-Benz emblem on the hood, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background, including one with scaffolding.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the road and sidewalks.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A car is visible on the right side of the road, parked near the sidewalk.
- bus: A large bus is visible on the road, traveling in the same direction as the camera.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the left side of the road, near a building.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign indicating a right turn is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including those supporting the traffic lights and signs.
